Reviews.Title: Highly recommended
Reviews.Author: WhtDaddy
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, especially for the price.  I got mine on black Friday for $79.99.  It takes great pictures, it's 10.3mp but shoots at 10.1mp.  Pictures are crystal clear, it is extremely easy to use, very very slim compact design with a massive screen, video capture is great and records in 480p high definition.  The zoom feature is amazing!  The pictures are great quality even when zooming all the way in.  I was on one side of my yard and my friend was about 20feet away and I used the zoom feature to capture a perfect face shot even from 20 feet away!  I am highly impressed with this camera, if you're debating I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Bad construction quality and low light photo
Reviews.Author: Oceanlight "bizowner"
Reviews.Content: It worked well for about three months but failed later. When we pressed the power on button, nothing happened anymore except the light blinked for a few seconds. We recharged it but didn't work. We had the same problem again with the replacement. I had a Fuji digital camera for years and it still worked. I won't ever buy camera from Kodak any more.

Reviews.Title: kodak won't help
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey R. Stephenson
Reviews.Content: I have purchased two of these cameras --- BOTH stopped working in under a year.  Bought the second one thinking the first was a fluke.  Kodak won't help since I don't have receipt of purchase -- even though they there is a serial number and manufacture date on the camera!

Reviews.Title: If it seems to good to be true, it is.
Reviews.Author: Romainiac
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on Black Friday at Target for $80, what a mistake.  Takes inconsistent pictures at best.  Indoor shots are very dark and have to photoshopped to see faces.  Spend the extra money on another camera, this one was obviously a poor, over made design that Kodak trounced out on the cheap to get rid of.  I will never by another Kodak product in my life again!  They should be embarrassed by how bad the camera is.

Reviews.Title: Won't Focus Anymore
Reviews.Author: Very Upset
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera when I first got it back in 2008. I was 14 and took very good care of it. I always had it in its case when not in use. Despite my efforts, there are literally hundreds of little white specks of lint stuck to the back of the very first plastic screen. And I recently discovered that it won't focus anymore!!! It doesn't even try! When I zoom in, the camera shuts off even at full battery. The date keeps resetting, the dial at the top is always sticking. It's never been dropped either. The battery doesn't last long at all, 30 minutes tops. I don't recommend this camera today. Just save the money to buy a better and newer camera!

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after four months - not sure why
Reviews.Author: Judi "All hearts open, all people connected"
Reviews.Content: It was nice and easy - worked well. Suddenly it won't open the lens, putting in batteries does not help. Any ideas anyone? I suppose I could take it back to Target but such a pain. Want to take pics - that's what I get for switching from my old Iphone for pics to Kodak.

Reviews.Title: Please don't waist you'd time!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: This camera arrived missing a charger and along with a docking station. A charger was sent to me a month later. Now the camera will not hold a charge. I  am very disappointed with the camera. I will have to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This camera lasted with me though out all of college and captured every memory along the way! I highly recommend this! It is an ideal point and shoot camera for those with a lower budget who still want great photographs

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: sbssis1
Reviews.Content: Great camera for taking pictures and videos because with a memory card it does hold a lot. Also, battery life is nice plus it's rechargeable. Photo quality is good if you have a steady hand but I am a little shaky so get a lot of blurry photos. Also, if in dim light the photos come out dark which is frustrating. However, overall it is a really nice, compact camera with several great features.

Reviews.Title: Not Good In Low Light Conditions
Reviews.Author: J. Wagner
Reviews.Content: Like another reviewer, I purchased this from Target during Black Friday in 2008.  The camera takes great pictures -- as long as there is lighting.  I cannot get the camera to take good photos in low light conditions.  I have missed getting photographs of many occasions now due to them being in low light.  You take a picture and basically you get a solid black picture.  Very upsetting.  Researching to get another one this year.  Other then in low-light situations, I have been very pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: J. Younis
Reviews.Content: I received the Kodak EasyShare MX1063 as a birthday gift from my son and I love it.  It is easy to use, nice and small and the pictures come out great.  My son purchased it for less than $100 on black Friday. Great value for the money.
